Articles.Content:
Hello! Im very new to the modding community, and thus far I havent been able to find a reliable Kopernicus tutorial. And, not to be rude, I'm sick of seeing all these KopernicusTech tutorials because they no longer work. So could someone supply me with a legitimate Kopernicus tutorial?

 

Thanks.

This is the best one I know of, good luck!

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/129540-a-beginners-guide-to-kopernicus-the-basics/#comment-2353710
